long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Tired of getting redirected to localhost when using ssh tunneling ? This extensions does a simple job, it uses the host previously used so you don't have to copy paste it every time ! And, you can add shortcuts in the options so that flash yourapp redirect to http://localhost:yourport/. Improve your ssh tunneling navigation with this extension ! You can also handle basic redirections. Cheerz
